title: Fancy Shoes (Remastered ver.)
lyrics:
Girl I prolly miss you baby
Girl I prolly miss you baby
Girl I prolly miss you baby
Oh oh
Uh nun tteumyeon maeil jungcheon-e

Geollin haeneun igsughae Ha

Uh ppallae geonjodae neul-eojyeo issneun sumanh-eun os jung-e

Gucci hanawa Thom browne

Hana golla ibgo jib bakk-eulo nawa

Cha-e sidong-eul neohji beompeoneun gwichanh-a an gochim



Aegjeong-i nagan nae pon-eun jigyeobge ul-eodaego

Sigan-eun tigtogtaegtog nal geuman jom jaechoghaejwo

Jeongsin-eobsji maeil banchighaneun aedeul

Jiltuhae sogmulgat-i

Halu jong-il saeng-gag eobs-i

Geuleoda eojjeoda balgyeonhan ne meoli



Pinpin sungan pingping dol-a

Geumbang uulhal yejeong-iya

Jakku jiljil kkeullyeodanineun geon wiheomhae

Igeon nae seutail-i aninde



Meosjin guduga naneun joh-a

Geuge eolmadeun an akkawo

Gajgo sip-eun geon da gajyeowa Ah ah

Geunde mwo ili singsungsaengsunghae Hey

Girl I prolly miss you baby nan geunyang

Girl I prolly miss you baby on dongne

Jjijilhan gamseong gadeug-iya

Hancham dong-an ileol geoya



Kkug jamgin cheoghaneun gieog-ui jamulsoedo

Dallyeoissjiman yeolsoe ju-in-eun na gat-a

Saepalahge muldeun haneul

Myeoch jogag an doeneun guleum

Tantanhae boyeodo

Geumbang muneojil geos gat-a



Ne meoli pinpin sungan pingping dol-a

Geumbang uulhal yejeong-iya

Jakku jiljil kkeullyeodanineun geon wiheomhae

Igeon nae seutail-i aninde



Meosjin guduga naneun joh-a

Geuge eolmadeun an akkawo

Gajgo sip-eun geon da gajyeowa Ah ah

Geunde mwo ili singsungsaengsunghae Hey

Girl I prolly miss you baby nan geunyang

Girl I prolly miss you baby on dongne

Jjijilhan gamseong gadeug-iya

Hancham dong-an ileol geoya



Hey hey ay

Hey hey oh



Yaegihal himdo eobs-eo

Oneul bamdo geulleoss-eo

Domangchigo sip-eodo eojjeol su eobsne

Hyeonsil-e jeomjeom igsughaejyeo



Gamhi huhoehalmanhan mannam-ieossda

Malhagi bukkeuleobjiman

Gasa wieseomankeum-eun yong-gamhaejineun beoleus

Mos gochyeo mos gochyeo geunom-ui godoghan cheog

Tto Rewind rewind rewind



Meosjin guduga naneun joh-a

Geuge eolmadeun an akkawo

Gajgo sip-eun geon da gajyeowa

Ah ah geunde mwo ili singsungsaengsunghae Hey

Girl I prolly miss you baby nan geunyang

Girl I prolly miss you baby on dongne

Jjijilhan gamseong gadeug-iya

Hancham dong-an ileol geoya



Girl I prolly miss you baby

Girl I prolly miss you baby

Jjijilhan gamseong gadeug-iya

Pyeongsaeng dong-an ileol geoya
